title: Piedmont, Polar Bear, Recruit coupons + others
author: T3s

posts.post_title: Piedmont, Polar Bear, Recruit coupons + others
posts.post_content:
Available are a few coupons issued during the T206 era.  Nice companion pieces to our precious cardboard.  Here are a few notes:

None of these coupons mentions baseball cards, as you can see from the scans.

Polar Bear - I have coupons showing expiration dates of June 09, 10, 11 & 12.  Otherwise they are all similar.  If you have a preference, please let me know.  I am asking $7 each for these.

Piedmont (white) - I have coupons showing expiration dates of June 09, 10 & 11.  Otherwise they are similar.  If you have a preference, please let me know.  I am asking $5 each for these.

Piedmont (pink) - AJ Reach League Baseball offer - asking $10 each

Recruit - asking $3 each for these

I have many other brands available:  Fatima, Union Leader, Murad, Mecca, Duke's Mixture, Sensation Cut Plug, Big John Plug Cut, Egyptienne Straights, Sweet Caporal, Miner's Extra, Five Brothers, Col Longleaf, Omega Plug Cut, John J Bagley, Brotherhood Cut Plug, Red Man, Blue Hen, High Card, Day & Night, Pinkerton, Frishmuths, I Lewis Cigar, Karnak, Turkish Trophies, Picnic
Twist.

Most are simply coupons to send in for catalogue items.  However, a few of the Fatimas are for the big B32 felts, the Murad are for the T6s, I have one Pinkerton for the T5 series and the Turkish Trophies are for the T7-6 Flag Girl series.

You can email me, or pm me.  I have several of the ones in the scans, some are better quality than others.  First come, first serve.  Paypal gift is welcome.  If using a SASE, please deduct $0.50 from your total.  Thanks !!!

Happy Collecting,
Craig
